ultimate.name: Laser Moon Mk.II
ultimate.description: Laser moons shoot two lasers,dealing extra damage

ultimate.name: Advanced targeting
ultimate.description: Missiles will change targets if their current one is destroyed

ultimate.name: EMP bomb

ultimate.name: Wide Phalanx
ultimate.description: Makes the Phalanx wider and increases it's durability
